QuestData.Title: Gar'gol's Gotta Go
QuestData.Description: <Kristoff cranes his neck, trying to look you in the eye.>$B$BListen, you gotta get me outta here. They're either going to eat me or turn me over to the Twilight's Hammer. Maybe both.$B$BThey've padlocked me in, and Gar'gol keeps the key in his personal treasure chest. Kill Gar'gol if you have to - but get that key!$B$B<Kristoff flails his limbs, helplessly.>
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Look for a lockbox somewhere near Gar'gol's enormous, crud-crusted feet.
QuestData.LogDescription: Get the Rusted Skull Key from Gar'gol's Personal Treasure Chest.
QuestData.RewardText: <Kristoff reaches down to snatch the key.>$B$BIt's about time!$B$B<He squirms in his bonds, trying to reach the padlock behind his back.>$B$B...Can I get a little help here?
